title: Clash SMS not working
body:
is anyone else having the same issue ?
i go to make a Clash team, have to verify it through SMS message but it won't send me a code to my cellphone

any ideas ?

replies.body: what format did you put it in, you dont put the 0 in front, you start with 4xxxxxxxx

Hey there, is it a prepaid phone number? I believe that prepaids might not be able to be used for verification for Clash in OCE.

Otherwise, I've seen a lot of players with SMS issues say it just worked after they kept trying. [Player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) may be able to provide more info on what you can do about this if the issue continues.
bro im trying to find a game but every time i click on it nothing happens any help
